page.title: 07 Wellow;Leisure Facilities.
page.content: Among the many clubs are W.I.,Care Groups,Cubs,Scouts,Venture Scouts, Brownies,Flower Group,Badminton, Happy-go-lucky club(for the elderly), the Cricket Club,and a Young Farmers Club. All ages and sexes are catered for. The Flower Group enter all arrangements in competitions and usually win!There is a new Community Hall,always in use. Residents agree that there are insufficient leisure facilities in Wellow;they prefer to go to Eastleigh or Southampton.The opinion was divided between sports and indoor leisure. Television is popular and the opinions on programmes vary.For women,domestic hobbies,including needlework and other crafts are popular.The men prefer to relax in the pubs!Music tastes vary from light classical to rock.
